name: mris_calc
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Simple calculator that operates on FreeSurfer curvatures and volumes.

inputs.description: The name of a FreeSurfer curvature overlay (e.g., rh.curv) or volume file (e.g., orig.mgz).
inputs.name: Input File 1

inputs.description: Mathematical action to perform on the input file(s), written as a text string.
inputs.name: Action

inputs.description: The second input for the calculation. Can be a file (e.g., rh.thickness) or a float number if the file does not exist.
inputs.name: Input File 2 or Float

inputs.description: Specify the output file name for the result of the calculation.
inputs.name: Output File

inputs.description: Constrain the calculation to vertices defined in the FreeSurfer label file.
inputs.name: Label File

inputs.description: Set the verbosity of the program.
inputs.name: Verbosity

output-files.description: The resulting FreeSurfer curvature overlay or volume file.
output-files.name: Output Curvature File
